title: EastEnders spoilers: Louise is in for a huge shock
text:
Louise Mitchell (Tilly Keeper) couldn’t be more excited about her future in EastEnders. She’s in a relationship with Keanu Taylor (Danny Walters) — a man whom she believes to be her one true love — and she’s carrying his baby too. However, the young woman is in for a massive shock in the coming episodes, as mum Lisa (Lucy Benjamin) drops a huge bombshell.

It’s been a tough couple of months for Louise and Keanu. The pair were forced to go into hiding when Ben (Max Bowden) framed Keanu for the attack on Phil (Steve McFadden), but they later returned to the Square and found themselves caught up in Hunter’s (Charlie Winter) revenge scheme, which resulted in Louise being taken hostage and Keanu getting shot.

In spite of recent events, things are finally looking up the pair and, with a baby on the way, they’re optimistic about their future.

However, Lisa drops a huge bombshell in the coming episodes, when she reveals her plans for them all to move to Portugal together. Both Louise and Keanu are stunned — but Keanu’s not convinced that it’s the best option for them both.

Advertisement

Advertisement

There’s a lot keeping Keanu in Walford, from his friends to his family — not to mention the fact that Sharon (Letitia Dean) is carrying his child — so it’s no wonder he’s not so sure about Lisa’s plan!

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Of course, the big question is: what will Louise make of her mum’s announcement?

A clean break after the year they’ve had could certainly do them the world of good, but then again she’d be forced to leave all her friends and family too.

Who will Louise side with?

EastEnders airs these scenes on Monday 21st October at 8pm on BBC One.
